name: sanitize-html
description: Clean up user-submitted HTML, preserving whitelisted elements and whitelisted attributes on a per-element basis

scripts.browserify-es5: browserify index.js -o dist/sanitize-html-es5.js -t [ babelify --presets [ env ] ] --standalone 'sanitizeHtml' && uglifyjs dist/sanitize-html-es5.js > dist/sanitize-html-es5.min.js
scripts.browserify: browserify index.js -o dist/sanitize-html.js --standalone 'sanitizeHtml' && uglifyjs dist/sanitize-html.js > dist/sanitize-html.min.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && npm run browserify-es5 && npm run browserify && npm run clean
